channel.title: yudel tweets

item.description: @yitzlandes Fear not. Black Friday is coming!
item.source:markdown: @yitzlandes Fear not. Black Friday is coming!

item.description: @Lexaphus It certainly does not help my mood when wrestling with a capitalization edge case knowing that the whole problem is spitting in the eye of G-d.
item.source:markdown: @Lexaphus It certainly does not help my mood when wrestling with a capitalization edge case knowing that the whole problem is spitting in the eye of G-d.

item.description: @datadivajf “Gotta pay your dues if you want to sing the blues and you know it don’t come easy,” to quote the Jewiest Beatle.
item.source:markdown: @datadivajf “Gotta pay your dues if you want to sing the blues and you know it don’t come easy,” to quote the Jewiest Beatle.

item.description: First Church of Bob Dylan, Economist. Count me in. https://t.co/j05uLu2nuz
item.source:markdown: First Church of Bob Dylan, Economist. Count me in. https://t.co/j05uLu2nuz

item.description: Once again, monotheism for the win. Such a debt of gratitude is owed to the Jews. https://t.co/FAARNOTR0b
item.source:markdown: Once again, monotheism for the win. Such a debt of gratitude is owed to the Jews. https://t.co/FAARNOTR0b

item.description: @nberlat So you’re saying we should add judges to the court but not more seats.
item.source:markdown: @nberlat So you’re saying we should add judges to the court but not more seats.

item.description:

@MommaMia6512 @laurastuart @joshtpm @JoshManning23 @JohnFetterman @DrOz Some times you gotta travel to where Blue Laws don’t block your shopping.

item.description: Little known parsha fact: Half the tribe of Menassah didn’t want to cross the Jordan because, as science fiction fans, they wanted to live in what would later be locations for Dune and Star Trek: Discovery. https://t.co/2WCzNUBLHf
item.source:markdown: Little known parsha fact: Half the tribe of Menassah didn’t want to cross the Jordan because, as science fiction fans, they wanted to live in what would later be locations for Dune and Star Trek: Discovery. https://t.co/2WCzNUBLHf

item.description:
@rmneiss I’m still not convinced that this isn’t all an excuse to launder Republican insurrectionists in November.

@rmneiss There’s not a lot of transparency in how these decisions were made.

@rmneiss And none of the decision makers care enough about Israel to, you know, make aliyah.
And they say a dollar doesn’t go as far as it used to. https://t.co/LYnyk6VjVa
item.source:markdown: And they say a dollar doesn’t go as far as it used to. https://t.co/LYnyk6VjVa

item.description: @jas_rivera @maimonides_nutz That would imply the existence of bad cinnamon, which seems implausible.

item.description:
@BillPascrell Never forget he once said that he was motivated to become a lawyer to overturn the One Person-One Vote jurisprudence of the 60s, which apparently inconvenienced his family.

@BillPascrell Opposition to multiracial democracy is at the core of his ideology.
item.source:markdown:
@BillPascrell Never forget he once said that he was motivated to become a lawyer to overturn the One Person-One Vote jurisprudence of the 60s, which apparently inconvenienced his family.
@BillPascrell Opposition to multiracial democracy is at the core of his ideology.

item.description: @scalzi Hoping “things” is not a euphemism for Kanji. Because I can’t help caring about your characters, even the villains.
item.source:markdown: @scalzi Hoping “things” is not a euphemism for Kanji. Because I can’t help caring about your characters, even the villains.

item.description:
@BenYehudaPress @sillyhead I just checked, and it turns out that Other Covenants hails from a works where a BYP title features three references to dogs (two of which describe eyebrows) but none to cats.

@BenYehudaPress @sillyhead * a world.
item.source:markdown:
@BenYehudaPress @sillyhead I just checked, and it turns out that Other Covenants hails from a works where a BYP title features three references to dogs (two of which describe eyebrows) but none to cats.
@BenYehudaPress @sillyhead * a world.

item.description:
@froomkin Meanwhile my Beloved Conservative Relative is still convinced (and emailing people) that “antifa” are the new “Brownshirts.”

@froomkin I doubt he knows anything about the reported role of the Proud Boys on 1/6 and their connections to the WH.

@froomkin It would be really nice if the Dems were to divert a few of the hundreds of millions they plan to pay for television ads to help us denazify our relatives.
@lavietidhar So, Rothian?
item.source:markdown: @lavietidhar So, Rothian?

item.description: @AvBronstein @JBSTVORG @RepLizCheney @AdamKinzinger The role of Tzipora will be played by Marilyn Monroe.
item.source:markdown: @AvBronstein @JBSTVORG @RepLizCheney @AdamKinzinger The role of Tzipora will be played by Marilyn Monroe.
